name: Why Are You Buying Clothes At The Soup Store! the game
name_original: Why Are You Buying Clothes At The Soup Store! the game
description:
A challenge I set for myself, to make a game in one day. It is based off of this SFM animation:

Yes, it is not perfect, it was never going to be perfect, however I made the game in one day and I am proud none the less!

-The Game-

W = jump

A = left

D = Right

Get to the clothes. Avoid the soup.

Warning!!! it is a Rage Game, It is HARD!  Have Fun!

- Eric
